member.name: T:PDF.Cropper.CoverPanel
member.summary: This class is a panel which is tansparent. This class is used to cover the other control, which should be click by mouse.

member.name: P:PDF.Cropper.CoverPanel.CreateParams
member.summary: CreateParams is a property of Control object. CreateParams is used to gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created. In this class, we override the property CreateParams, and set the ExStyle = ExStyle Or 0x20 to make the background is trasparent.

member.name: M:PDF.Cropper.CoverPanel.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)
member.summary: We override the sub OnPaintBackground to prevent the background of this panel from being painted.

member.name: T:PDF.Cropper.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:PDF.Cropper.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:PDF.Cropper.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
